sect1.title: Changelog for MIPS
sect1.para: Below is a list of changes specifics for this architecture made since the previous release of the book. For general changes see ,

listitem.para: [kanj] - Updated cross-tools/uclibc to address .size issue Update cross-tools/gcc-final for lib-mudflap error. Updated bootable/kernel to point to proper location of vmlinux, address the error on unused variable, and to activate kernel config for initial ramdisk. Updated te-end/boot to boot using QEMU. System gets to "Press Enter to activate console", but is unresponsive afterwards.
[abradford] - Added selection of MIPS arch, endian, and float. These are now used when building GCC.
[abradford] - Added support in uClibc for MIPS level 3 and ABI choices of n32 and n64.
